game_selection.title-1: "Dive into the heart of oneself and discover others."
game_selection.description-1: "Explore your inner universe by answering introspective questions to better understand yourself and follow your personal evolution."
game_selection.title-2: "Dive into the heart of oneself and discover others."
game_selection.description-2: "Deepen your relationship by discussing intimate topics about life as a couple, such as sexuality, complicity, and trust."
game_selection.title-3: "Dive into the heart of oneself and discover others."
game_selection.description-3: "Share quality moments with your loved ones by discussing a variety of questions to develop mutual understanding and strengthen your bonds."
game_selection.title-4: "Dive into the heart of oneself and discover others."
game_selection.description-4: "Be stimulated through exciting discussions on controversial questions, exploring politics, philosophy and more with your loved ones."

question.question-1: To what extent does the opinion of strangers affect you ? and how could you free yourself from it ?
